newsitem.title: USA: Channell Commercial to make acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Channell Commercial to make acquisition.

text.p: Channell Commercial Corp, a maker of cable television and telecommunications network products, has signed a deal to acquire RMS Electronics Inc, a privately owned company based in Secaucus, N.J..
Terms of the deal were undisclosed. The acquisition is expected to be completed in January 1997.

RMS designs and produces high performance, radio frequency electronic devices such as signal splitters/combiners and power inserters. It generates annualized revenues of about $9.0 million and complements Channell's core telecommunications business.
"RMS will add a new dimension to the range of products we offer our telecommunications customers," William Channell Jr, chief executive officer, said in a statement.

"Expanding our product line to include higher technology, radio frequency passive electronic devices supports our complete system approach in the "curb to home infrastructure" portion of broadband telecommunications networks," he added.
